1.content:
In a fantasy world of swords, sorcery and magic, monsters roam freely and terrorize the people of the Aufborian Kingdom, a well populated land, covered in blankets of pure white snow, accompanied by harsh winds. The ruler of your kingdom, King William, is a tyrant, who only cares for his power, and not the people; the only reason he began his reign of power was because of the previous king, his father.

As a child, your hometown was always disturbed by evil monsters such as werewolves, vampires, witches, and other things. This might seem strange, but the area you grew up in had always had a long history of being attacked by monsters, no one ever really knew why. Due to this fact, you grew up in a life of fear... and your hatred grew for monsters more and more everyday.

Many years later, in your adulthood, your anger towards these evil beings had never stopped growing, and you've decided to take up monster hunting as a job. Armed with only a crossbow and a dagger sheathed in your dark leather attire, you've left your home to look for jobs in the main city. You take your horse to the immense city known as Lorenburg...

On your way their...
1.title: The beginning of your ticklish adventure...

choices: Check the bounty board for information.
Ask around for information on monsters.
Who cares about the city? Investigate the forests!
Buy some some supplies before going to hunt.
11.content:
After leaving your horse in the stables, you enter the enormous gates leading to the city, you gaze upon its beauty; behind the walls of the city are the crowds and crowds of people cluttered everywhere, followed by houses, inns, taverns, and blacksmith shops--the usual things found in a city.

Upon entrance you decide on what you should do first...
11.title: You arrive safely.

111.content:
As you walk across the cobblestone path, through the crowds of murmuring people, you finally make your way to the bounty board--covered in dozens of different papers, with prices on different heads.

As you observe the different bounties, a few stand out to you...

-"Alyssa: The spider woman."
-"Local children gone missing: Gold payment for their safe return."
-"Evil fairies: Fairies in the nearby forests have been causing mischief."

As you ponder the decision, thinking about both payment and the threat of these evil beings, you decide to choose...
111.title: Check the bounty board for information.

choices: You become entangled in the webs.
You hear the skittering of multiple legs.
1111.content:
You rip the paper from the board and read up further on the deed. It says that the half spider half woman being lives in different caves, where she spins webs to capture lost travelers. You think to yourself; this might be too hard for you to handle, you've never battled anything such as this. But the feeling soon fades away, as your fear is outweighed by courage, and you cast yourself off into wilderness, in search of the menacing monster.

You decide it's best to look for the spider herself--in caves. Riding your horse on the road, you notice a cave behind the trees of a forest. You also see what seems like spider webs covering the outside. Dismounting your horse, you begin your way towards the ominous cave, carrying your knife out, ready to defend yourself. You finally make your way to the cave entrance, and take a closer look at the webs around the entrance. Luckily for you, they don't seem too old, she still might be in there, or at least close by.

As you slice through the webs, you notice they are surprisingly stronger than any regular webs; by the time you had made it through, you were already tired. You also notice there are even more webs, this might be harder than you thought...

As you start your way through the cave, something happens...
1111.title: The spider woman.

11111.content:
After catching your breath, you move on, walking through the dirt covered ground of the cave, passing through the surprisingly strong webs. As you move forward, you take an unlucky step and trip up, falling backwards into a small hole, just large enough for you to slip through.

This hole was more of a tunnel, leading you into a lower level of the cave. As you fall through, you land right onto a large patch of spider webs, well enough to fit your whole body. As you look around, your arms and legs are spread out on the web, in an x-shaped position.

You try to break free from the grasp of the webs, struggling in the sticky webs, you try with all your strength to rip through them, but to no avail.

Why are these webs so strong You thought to yourself, accepting the fact that you're stuck. After a few minutes, you feel something vibrating on the strings of the web. It felt as if something were coming.

In your vulnerable position you begin to panic, and struggle with the webs even more, but this just seems to attract more attention, as you could feel whatever was coming come closer and closer.

You look to your sides, and out of the gloomy cave darkness appears...
11111.title: You become entangled in the webs.

choices: You hear something much larger coming towards you.
An adventurer comes to rescue you!
The spiders leave you, but for what reason?
111112.content:
You see dozens of the horrific eight-legged arachnids slowly descend onto you, until you are covered in them. Too scared to move you lay there, accepting your fate. They crawl all over you, skittering along your clothing. Before long, one finds an opening in your shirt, and you feel it's thin legs tapping along your bare skin, jolting laughter out of you.

"Hehehe" You giggle, as your try to keep yourself from succumbing to the laughter. You realize that the other spiders have also notice the opening in your shirt, and a few others join in. Soon, you felt an uncountable amount of poking on every ticklish point on your skin.

At this point, you couldn't contain your laughter, the spiders were too much for you. They just kept crawling and crawling, as if they were just curious, and didn't have a clue to what kind of torture they were putting your through.

Right now, you were in giggling Hell. The worst part was you couldn't do a thing about the spiders, you've heard that the cave spiders in these parts can be extremely dangerous, and you've chosen this is the best option at the moment.

Perhaps someone will hear me in here? You hoped, although you could barely listen to your own thoughts through the sound of your uncontained laughter.

What happens next? Does someone come to the rescue?
111112.title: Dozens of spiders! (Uh-oh)

choices: Wait, maybe you can find another way out.
Attack her now, while you have the element of surprise.
Confront her, perhaps she'll listen to reason?
11112.content:
You heard quiet, yet audible taps, that seemed to come closer... and fast. Quickly, you go to the side, hiding behind a cave wall. As the skittering comes closer, you notice it's Alyssa, the monster herself. She was quite beautiful, aside from her arachnid lower half, she had a slim figure, an attractive face, and wore light leather clothing. She's also fairly large, slightly taller than you, probably due to her extended legs.

She moves quickly past you, and towards one of the webs you broke at the entrance.

"What happened here?" She mumbles to herself, as she looks at the webs you destroyed.

She begins spinning new webs, although this might trap you here, you decide...
11112.title: You hear the skittering of multiple legs.

choices: You take the kids back home
1112.content:
Your search for the missing children, leads you to an pretty looking forest. You look around and you can't help but admire its beauty. Suddenly you hear screams,two screams in fact. Snapping out of your thoughts, you rush to the source and what you see surprises you. Two kids, a boy and a girl, no more then 7 at least, were laughing hysterically as a catgirl tickled them playfully.

You had a "You got to be kidding me" look as you saw the situation. "Aw, you two are so cute and ticklish. Maybe here and here." The feline said as the drove the kids mad. Seeing enough, you jump down and confront the playful feline. She seemed human from a glance but the ears and tail would give her away. Your earlier surprise turned into anger as you eyes the monster with pure hatred. "Another toy. You can join them and we can all have fun Nyaa" The catgirl held a smile that was both playful and devious. The feline charges and catches you off guard with her surprising speed. She pins you to the ground and as you prepare for the worst, you feel her fingers gliding all over your ribs and belly. You start laughing as the catgirl tickles you. 'Hahahaha Whahahat Hahaha stahahahap"

You thrash and laugh but are unable to get her off you. You try punching her but to your shock, it does nothing. Growing desperate and running low on energy from laughing so much, you tickle the catgirl's belly. "Hahahahaha thahaht tihihihckles" She laughs and lets go clutching her stomach, trying to keep her laughter under control. You get up and catch your breath and look surprised. You end up realizing if you want to beat her, you'll have to play by their rules. While she's still trying to calm down, you tackle her and tickle her belly again. "Hahahahahahahahahaha-Hahahahahahaha tihihihihihis is fuhuhuhuhun" Despite her dilemma, she seemed to be enjoying it. After a few minutes of torture, you get off her as she crawls away giggling hysterically. You go over to the kids and make sure their ok. Then-
1112.title: The investigation of missing children.-A catgirl

choices: They begin to explore other areas.
They bring you some place else.
1113.content:
You decide to take the fairy case--after all, how deadly can some tiny fairies be?

As you rip the paper from its nails on the board, you read that there have been sightings of them in the deep inner forests just outside of the city. You also see a picture of a fairy with dark crimson red wings, and a black dress.

Determined to ease through your first case, you head out to the local forest. Upon leaving the city gates, you are welcomed to the land's cold and windy weather. After about 10 minutes of travel, you dismount your horse, and approach the forest that is supposedly infested with evil fairies. You observe the the trees, covered in snow, and notice it's pretty crowded in there for someone your size, but you'll manage. Worst case scenario, you trip up a little.

Ready to enter, you dive right in, beginning to look for certain clues that would suggest a fairy is near. You look closer at some of the snow-covered leaves and see small footprints...

Ah-ha! They must be close, these seem recent. You think, a little excited this is going so well. As you follow the same direction you were going, you trip over the root of a tree, hidden under the snow. You hit your head on the rock, leaving a mark on your forehead, and leaving you slightly dazed. Just then, you hear some giggling in the distance, and you also feel the the branches and roots of the trees begin to wrap around your ankles and wrists, until you were immobile. The branches continued wrapping around you until you were lifted from the ground and hanging from your wrists.

As the giggles become louder you hear the flutters of wings around you. Trying to turn your neck to see what's happening you turn to the small face of one of the fairies similar to the picture from the bounty board. She must have used her magic to control the trees.

"What have we here, an adventurer, explorer, or perhaps a lost traveler?" She says, giggling, as more fairies appear from behind the trees.

"I'm here to hunt you down and banish your kind from these lands!" You growl out. Seeing the look on her face, you probably provoked her. You realize this may have been a foolish idea, considering you're defenseless at the moment, so you keep yourself silent, to keep things from getting worse.

"Oh? You're not in much of a position to say such things."

"How about we punish him for coming with such bad intentions?" One of the other fairies interrupts.

"I think we know just what to do. Ladies! After you..." She says trying to keep a few uncontrollable laughs down.

To your horror they approach you. What could they possibly be planning?!? You think to yourself, and in a split second you feel them all rush towards you--there must be a dozen of them! They begin to unbutton the front of your leather armor and you feel them jump right into your shirt.

As you begin to laugh uncontrollably, you feel some of them exploring the area, fluttering their wings all over. While some of the others begin to use their own 'techniques'; a few wiggle their tiny fingers over your naked skin, while others take a more savage approach. You feel the warm tongues of a few fairies painting your whole tummy with saliva. The combined feeling of their soft wings fluttering, tiny fingers wiggling, and slimy tongues licking causes you to explode with even more laughter.

"HAHAHAHHAHAHHAAAAAA STOP PLEASEEEE"

"Why? Your smooth skin is just too delicious!" You hear one of their muffled voices say underneath your shirt.

As this continues, something happens...
1113.title: The evil fairies.

11132.content:
As they all flutter out, one by one, skittering across your delicate skin, the form as a group in front of you...

"Well, I think you've learned your lesson. We're gonna be taking our leave now, perhaps you might encounter us later." She says, giving you a wink.

"WAIT! UNTIE ME FIRST!!!" You yell out, panting from your recent tickle assault. Although, you yelled as loud as you could, you could tell they were already gone by the distant giggles you heard getting quieter and quieter, until you were left with only the sound of your panting, and the wind, still bound to the tree.

I will not give up. You think to yourself, and you muster up some courage and begin yelling for nearby help.

"HELP!!!" You scream aloud. "HELP!"

You do this for a few minutes, when you begin to hear footsteps approach you, possibly multiple people...

Who is it/Who are they?
11132.title: They become bored and leave.

choices: You hatch up a plan for escape.
111321.content:
As the footsteps got louder, they became more and more thunderous and intimidating. You heard the metal clinks of their greaves heading towards you. Moments later you're regretting ever yelling "help" in the first place, as your face to face with the leader of a band of orcs. She has an athletic and strong figure, yet slim She is also wearing heavy armor over fur clothing to keep her warm.

"What have we here? Fresh meat?" She yells out, laughing. Before you could try to reason with her, she knocks you out cold, and everything goes black.

As you awaken, you still feel that hit, it must have left a mark. You also realize you are in some sort of hut, and a quite large one; it could possibly house a dozen people. You realize you are still bound--this time by ropes to chair, with your arms up. After minutes of struggling in the ropes, a couple of orcs come in. They look at you, then take a seat at a nearby table.

What happens next?
111321.title: A band of Orc raiders.

choices: They stop and bring more orcs in.
1113212.content:
Deciding you shouldn't even try to reason with them, you just wait it out. A few moments later you notice them whispering to each other, glancing at you from time to time. Eventually, they get out of their seats and walk towards you.

"So you're the new prisoner, huh?" One of them says, leaning in closer to you, while the other stands back and watches.

"You must be a human." She says, looking you up and down. "I've heard humans have smooth, ticklish bodies.

"Yeah, well, not me..." You retort, trying to dissuade her from even attempting to touch you. Meanwhile the other sneaks up behind you--you don't notice her.

"Then this won't bother you a bit, will it?" She whispers softly into your ear, almost sadistically. Then, she begins to poke around your sides, revealing how ticklish you really are. The orc in front of you also joins along holding up your feet to another chair, as she begins taking your boots off.

"Oh, just you wait till I get to your soft soles." She teases, while the orc behind you has moved to tickling your armpits.

"HAHAHHAHAEHHHEHHE" You squeal, laughing more and more, until you feel the hot air of the room around your feet, and you realize you're really in for trouble now...

What happens next?
1113212.title: Not again!

12.content:
On your way to Lorenburg, you begin to feel the winds get harsher, and it increasingly became harder to see. Eventually your horse had become exhausted and fell flat on its side right their in the middle of the stone road. This left you slightly dazed on the ground when suddenly you feel something hit your head from behind and everything goes black...

In an unknown amount of time, you regain consciousness. You still can't see; it seems you have some sort of bag around your head. As you try to reach for it you realize you are also bound, stretched out in an x shaped position.

At least I'm indoors. You think to yourself, as whoever had kidnapped you, had also probably just saved your life. Just then, you hear footsteps walk towards you, and you feel your bag taken off of your head. Your eyes adjust to the lighting and you see...
12.title: You are ambushed!

121.content:
As you look around you notice three female vampires, as wicked as they are beautiful. They are each wearing tight black dresses secured by leather straps, and black lipstick accompanied by black nails.

You also look down to notice the majority of your clothing has been removed. As you observe the surroundings, it seems you are in some sort of dungeon; there are shackles all around, accompanied by other contraptions and torches illuminating the room.

"What is the meaning of this! Why am I tied down?" You say in your best intimidating tone, showing no fear.

"Now is that any way to treat the people who have just saved your life?" One of the vampires says, appearing unaffected by your toughness act.

You silence yourself, not wanting to show them any respect, although you were grateful they had gotten you out of the mess you were in.

"Now I don't know about you girls..." One of them says, "but I think we deserve a reward."

At the end of that sentence they all give you an evil smirk.

Scared they might kill you where you stand... or lay, you begin to stutter out some words. "W-woah I can give you some gold, please don't hurt me, I've done nothing."

"We don't want your petty gold, cutie..." One of them says as they position themselves around you.

"We want to hear you laugh with fear." The other one says.

In the blink of an eye, you begin to feel their dark nails skitter and scatter all over your vulnerable body; one of the vampires at your soft soles, and the other two at your upper-body.

"HEHEHEHEHHAHAHAHWHATTHEHELLHAHAHEHEH" You burst out, as the ticklish sensations begin. You knew you were ticklish, but not this ticklish. After only a few minutes under their skillful fingers you feel them spread out a little more...

The vampire at your feet left them and moved up to your thighs, and began to squeeze, poke, and prod them, forcing more giggles and laughs out of you. Then the other vampires at your mid-section split up--one towards your smooth armpits, spidering inside them. The other one, who had stayed, decided to hop onto your stomach, and lightly stroke her nails all over your ribs and sides.

As you begin to tire out and break a sweat, something happens...
121.title: A group of vampires!

choices: They've had their fun, and release you.
They bring out tools to tickle you with.
1211.content:
Halted to a sudden stop, you look up to the vampires eyeing all over your body, licking their lips. What are they planning? You think to yourself, right before you feel something warm and wet roll up the sole of your foot. As you glance toward your feet, you see one of them beginning to glide her tongue up and down the soles of your feet, leaving you a giggling mess.

"HAHHEHHHEHE-WHAT THE HE-HAHAHA HELL ARE YOU DOIN-HAHA" You burst out, as the other vampires follow the other her lead.

The one on top of you, sitting on your legs, lowered her head down to your belly and began licking around your naval, eventually prodding into it, and repeating. While the other, at your armpits, dove head-first right into your deep, smooth armpits, while using her other hand to tickle your other side.

"OH MY GAHAHAH *GASP*" You say, already tiring out in mere seconds "NO PLEAHHAHAHAH"

"Mmmmm, your tummy is so delicious, I could just lick it all day." She says, as she kisses all over your upper-body, leaving black lip-stick marks everywhere.

"How about we give him/her a break, huh?" The one at your foot says to the girls, as she also begins kissing your feet. Followed by the one, who had just soaked your armpits, beginning to kiss from your neck, to your mouth.

You didn't know how to act in this situation--you were still feeling the occasional fingernail poking your naked skin, but you felt their lips tease you all over. Soon, you were covered in black lip-stick marks, all over, ranging from your neck and cheeks, to the soles of your feet.

At this point you were too exhausted to try and plead with them. As they continued, you lost track of time. It could have been minutes, or even an hour.

Just then, something happens...
1211.title: Tongue-tickling insanity!

choices: In the bed of an Inn.
You don't know, you are still bound and blindfolded.
1213.content:
As you burst out a few uncontained giggles, one of the vampires says, "I think we've had our fair share of fun girls. How about we set our cute little tickle toy free, shall we?"

As you sigh with relief, you are disturbed by the sudden silence. You look around, and all you see is them staring back.

"Of course, we don't want him/her to know our hideout."

"Then we'll have to make sure he/she won't know our hideout." One of them whispers into your ear, as she begins to dig into your underarms.

"HAHAHHHEHESTOOOOP I WON'T-hehehe TELL ANYONE." You scream out.

"We can't trust you." Another one says teasingly, poking in and around your belly button, while the other rakes up and down the soles of your delicate feet.

The combined feeling of all 30 of their fingers running along your sensitive body left you tickled senseless. In a matter of minutes--although it felt like hours, you were becoming exhausted as they continued tickling basically everwhere on your body. As you felt more and more tired, you begin to feel your eyes closing and everything going black.

"Nighty night." You hear one of them whisper.

You wake up (again lol) where?
1213.title: They release you.

123.content:
You awaken inside, thankfully out of the elements, but stretched across an x-framed device in a dark, torch-lit place with no windows, at the mercy of one of the following types of witches:

> A beautiful seductress who teases and tickles you (possibly with the help of her familiar?).

> A withered old hag who summons up spirits who delight in your screams of laughter.

> A whole coven of witches who summon up a demon to tickle-torture you.
123.title: Which of These Witches?

choices: Seek vengeance against those who have destroyed the city.
Take one of the paths at the crossroads.
13.content:
What happens?

Do you find the city in ruins, burned to ashes?

Or do you get lost in the weather and find yourself at crossroads; both ways leading to unknown places.

Perhaps you decide to travel elsewhere?
13.title: Something else happens...

info.brief_description: You're a monster hunter who happens to find themself in ticklish situations...
info.description:
Hi, I'm the creator of World of Tickles, my first interactive tickle story! This is my second tickle interactive, based around monster hunting, as you've probably seen in the title. Originally this was an idea that I was going to implement into World of Tickles, but I've seen more potential in it and decided to make it its own interactive!

Rules: (Basically same as World of Tickles)
1) Try to have correct grammar. (A few small mistakes are fine.)
2) Avoid short chapters if possible.
3) I want this to be a tickling interactive, so stick with tickling please.
4) Sexual interactions are allowed, and encouraged, provided you fit them in well. Go wild! ;)
5) Write as if you're talking to the reader (I forgot what the word for that is); ex: "You are tickled" or "She/he tickles you".
6) Female ticklers preferred, but male ticklers are allowed.
7) Feel free to add chapters, and enjoy! :D

If you have questions or want me to edit your chapter, email me, and I'll get back to you ASAP.
